description:
Devold Norang Tee is a t-shirt with print in 100% premium Merino wool. A short-sleeved woollen tee which is suitable for hot summer days and is also perfect under a middle layer in cooler temperatures. Made in our finest quality, which is extremely soft and gentle on the skin.

Thermo-regulating Merino wool has excellent moisture wicking properties. Merino wool has a cooling effect in hot weather and feels warm against the skin if the temperature drops. Wool ensures a healthy microclimate for the skin, keeping bacteria away, so that woollen garments do not retain odours.
name: Devold Norang Merino 150 Tee - Mens
